entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then southwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
